Ваше питання: Напиши програму калькулятора на Swift для MacOS

Відповідь: import Cocoa

class CalculatorViewController:NSViewController {

    @IBOutlet weak var display: NSTextField!
    
    var currentValue: Int = 0
    var operation: String = ""
    var totalValue: Int = 0
    var typingNumber: String = ""
    
    override func viewDidLoad() {
        super.viewDidLoad()
        setupUI()
    }
    
    private func setupUI() {
        display.stringValue = "\(currentValue)"
    }
    
    // Numbers
    @IBAction func numbers_clicked(_ sender: NSButton) {
        typingNumber += sender.title
        currentValue = Int(typingNumber) ?? 0
        display.stringValue = "\(currentValue)"
    }
    // Operation
    @IBAction func expression_clicked(_ sender: NSButton) {
        operation = sender.title
        totalValue = currentValue
        currentValue = 0
        typingNumber = ""
    }
    // Equal
    @IBAction func calc_clicked(_ sender: Any) {
        switch operation {
        case "+":
            currentValue += totalValue
        case "-":
            currentValue = totalValue - currentValue
        case "*":
            currentValue *= totalValue
        case "/":
            currentValue = totalValue / currentValue
        case "%":
            currentValue = totalValue * currentValue / 100
        default:
            print("no operator specified")
        }
        totalValue = 0
        typingNumber = ""
        display.stringValue = "\(currentValue)"
    }
    // Clear
    @IBAction func clear_clicked(_ sender: Any) {
        totalValue = 0
        currentValue = 0
        operation = ""
        typingNumber = ""
        display.stringValue = ""
    }

}
